MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G1 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Hanover Court and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:13pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work required on our electrical network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:48pm on 25th January 2021.
